verses.text: Once, \nd Lord\nd*, you did favor \w your|strong="H1121"\w* land, granting change \w of|strong="H1121"\w* fortune \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob,
forgiving \w the|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* people, pardoning \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin, \qs Selah\qs*
withdrawing \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* fury, turning \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* hot \w anger|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w our|strong="H3605"\w* savior, \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w displeasure|strong="H2740"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* cherish \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* forever, prolonging \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w wrath|strong="H3708"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* generations?

Will \w you|strong="H1755"\w* not revive us again, \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H4900"\w* people \w may|strong="H1755"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* glad \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w you|strong="H1755"\w*?
Show \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* kindness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, grant \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* salvation.

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* hear \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Soon|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* see \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* saves, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* glory \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* live \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land.
Kindness \w and|strong="H3519"\w* loyalty meet; peace \w and|strong="H3519"\w* righteousness kiss.
\w Loyalty|strong="H2617"\w* springs \w from|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* earth; \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* looks \w from|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* sky.
\w The|strong="H8064"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* give all \w that|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H6664"\w* good, our \w land|strong="H8064"\w* yielding its increase,
righteousness marching before \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* path \w he|strong="H3068"\w* treads.
